results.title: Expansion of metals
results.creator_credit: Jack Smith and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Physics in action”.
Covers the expansion of a wire due to increase in heat from electric current: determination of the coefficient of expansion of brass; application of expansion in rails; building constructions and bridges; shrink fitting and expansion fitting of metal couplings. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Expanding math skills with the mini-calculator: introduction
results.creator_credit: James M. Smith, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Aesop Films, Susan Norton and Louis Hough
results.brief_description: Many examples demonstrate how teachers can use mini-calculators to motivate and augment learning, check student work, explore number patterns and sequences, examine decimals, estimate solutions and stimulate mathematical curiosity and creativity. Students are shown in class and on field trips as they solve a variety of problems with the calculator. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.

results.title: Exotic Bali
results.brief_description: An introductory travelogue focusing on the potential tourist attractions that Bali has to offer. Areas included are: Farmlife and market life, cultural ceremonies and way of life, cock fighting, a Balanese funeral procession, cultural ceremonies.

results.title: Exit (2016)
results.brief_description: Electronic music video co-created by Snowden that describes the perils of surveillance culture.

constellations_other.name: Orwell & Snowden
constellations_other.description: Explores Orwell as a representation of the NSA, and the infamous Snowden leak.

results.title: Exit
results.creator_credit: Dennis Meltzer, Aranda Films and Bruce McNaughton
results.brief_description: A drama about a group of people stranded at an old wartime guesthouse during a flood. One guest announces that he has the power to “decreate” people and is asked to demonstrate. From an original story by Harry Farjeon. Cast includes: Mark Albiston, Stewart Faichney, Tom Lake, Dina Mann, Brian Moll, John Russell and Sandra Wright.

results.title: Exile
results.creator_credit: Gilbert Lauzun, Joe O'Brien and United Nations Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “International Zone”.
Tells the story of Wilson Conco, a black South African physician who left South Africa because of the apartheid system and now lives with his family in London.

results.title: Exhaustion exposure
results.brief_description: Deals with the causes of exhaustion exposure. Covers such topics as: food intake; mixed ability walking groups; producing, losing and controlling body heat; emergency procedure when in the mountains. Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.
